Book Library Documentation
======================================

Book Library is a comprehensive Django application for managing book libraries.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 6
   :caption: Contents:

   bookprocess

Quick Navigation
================

Core Modules
------------

* :doc:`bookprocess.models` - Database models (Book, Author, Genre, etc.)
* :doc:`bookprocess.views` - Web views and API endpoints
* :doc:`bookprocess.admin` - Admin interface customization

Business Logic
--------------

* :doc:`bookprocess.services` - Service layer and business logic
* :doc:`bookprocess.utils` - Utility functions and helpers

Management
----------

* :doc:`bookprocess.management` - Custom management commands
* :doc:`bookprocess.apps` - Application configuration

Indices and tables
==================

* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
